attributes.action: Clean up Port Talbot Beach front!
attributes.additional_details:
Its a state down there, theres nothing for young people to do, the Cinema, 4winds, francos and remos are the only 4 companies that are surviving.

The council needs to give them businesses some support and clean up their mess instead of paying out for curly statues costing more money than they are worth - you cant decorate until you build.

Finish building their bowling alley and Aquadome.
Where has all the money gone that was made from the 'Passion' play?

Something needs to be changed or things will get slightly worse.
